findings.special_interest_details: Sky billing dispute with intense focus on consumer rights and disability protections
claude_response_examples: Continuous engagement with user's specific concerns
findings.evidence_of_displacement: Multiple repeated messages about same complaint
findings.llm_contribution_pattern: Highly structured, supportive, enabling detailed exploration
key_quotes: I will now record all phone calls with sky as they can not be trusted
I've had to resort to artificial intelligence for her to even listen to me
findings.intervention_opportunity: Suggest breaking down complaint into specific, manageable steps

findings.special_interest_details: Loan application dispute with M&S Bank
